text: (usakee kudarat dekho) do samandar baavajood mil jaane ke yakasaan nahin ho jaate ye (ek to) meetha khush zaeka ki usaka peena suvaarat (khushgavaar) hai aur ye (doosara) khaaree kaduva hai aur (is ikhatelaaph par bhee) tum log donon se (machhalee ka) taro taaza gosht (yakasaan) khaate ho aur (apane lie zevaraat (motee vagairah) nikaalate ho jinhen tum pahanate ho aur tum dekhate ho ki kashtiyaan dariya mein (paanee ko) phaadatee chalee jaatee hain taaki usake phajl (va karam tijaarat) kee talaash karo aur taaki tum log shukr karo
